---
title: "Volunteer with THRIVE"
---

Help your communities to THRIVE! We invite you to join THRIVE Lifelines international 
team of volunteers and begin offering life-saving and life-affirming support. 
Our volunteers are students and professionals, working remotely from all over the world. 
When you volunteer with us, you will be provided opportunities for mentorship, skill 
development, and leadership growth. Whatever your passions or experience level, we have 
a place for you!

<br>
Volunteer with THRIVE! [**Apply Here**](https://form.jotform.com/201655418668059).
We will reply within 48 hours.

Requirements:

* 18+ years old
* Identify as an underrepresented individual
* Willingness to complete 40 hours of training (8 weeks), one or two 3-hour
on-call shifts per week, and 1-year commitment (Crisis Responders)
    + Training begins with Orientation and training intervals are re-offered every
      four weeks to allow for flexibility.
    + Training must be completed in no more than 6 months
    + If you are interested in an accelerated training schedule, please inquire.
* Willingness to complete 4 hours of training and an average of 3-5 hours per
week (all non-crisis response volunteers)
* Willingness to listen non-judgmentally to those in crisis

Note: No prior experience is necessary. We promise mentoring all along the way,
as well as high quality, empathetic training, and team collaboration.

* Our training is centered in Whole-Human, empathetic support, cross-identity
affirmation, trauma-informed care, and skillful deescalation
* Volunteers can work from any location: all that is required is a computer
with reliable internet and a private space.
* We greatly value representation and encourage applications from people who 
identify as **persons of color, persons living with disabilities, Two Spirit, 
trans-femme and/or femme nonbinary individuals, and/or veterans.**

<br>
We have the following volunteer positions available. *Full job descriptions are available in links beside each position.*

   * **Crisis Responder**: Crisis Responder on THRIVE Lifeline: This volunteer will actively 
     talk to, listen to, and help texters to the hotline. 
     [Full Description](https://drive.google.com/file/d/1IzXOQbvbEWZ_jM1NnnalyVNk5LDBsTy0/view)
   * **Volunteer Coordinator**: This volunteer is a part of THRIVE's leadership team and will
   actively recruit volunteers, process applications, onboard volunteers, and facilitate 
   volunteer orientations.
     [Full Description](https://drive.google.com/file/d/1IcOmy7zFi6_JK-tXnwVt2-mCSJ6GAEth/view)
   * **Line Supervisor**: Great for grad students or early career professionals who have crisis 
   intervention experience! This volunteer will support Crisis Responders during their shifts
   being able to provide backup or deescalation in complex situations. 
   [Full Description](https://drive.google.com/file/d/1KZIvOhlpTdmqFlBwhASe0rPVxxsU2dBW/view)
   * **Training Assistant**: This volunteer will support our Crisis Responders in
   Training (CRiT) by acting as texters to the hotline and conducting practice
   text-based interactions at appointed times (within the Assistant's scheduled
   availability). The volunteer will be given one scripted scenario, along with
   its desired CRiT learning outcomes. A practice interaction will be
   approximately 40-60 min.   
   [Full Description](https://drive.google.com/file/d/1xkAzZhHrGs4GUVIykK1xxEy6jwouxr08/view)
   * **Resource Manager**: This volunteer will manage the vetting and addition of
   new resources to our database.
   [Full Description](https://drive.google.com/file/d/1yKHvWDhegqVUFTdJ4aZa0Hwd5MEFz2MU/view)
   * **Outreach Assistant**: This volunteer will assist with outreach, sharing
   THRIVE Lifeline as a resource and broadening the impact of the hotline.
   * **Social Media Coordinator**: This volunteer will oversee all social media team members 
   and aid in cross-collaboration between our various platforms as well as organize content
   development and posting.
      [Full Description](https://drive.google.com/file/d/1CPEBocokCRSqq_CBUmf5pcKFsI-JXokS/view)
   * **Social Media Team Members**: This volunteer will assist our Outreach Coordinator
   and social media team with pointing people to THRIVE Lifeline in a manner 
   that uplifts marginalized identities.
         [Full Description](https://drive.google.com/file/d/1skqhjX80sC_wSPx-UnU_zRwVsCEwYD6G/view)
      + We are especially seeking science communicators.

   
<br>
Volunteer with THRIVE! [**Apply Here**](https://form.jotform.com/201655418668059).
We will reply within 48 hours.

<br>

Crisis Responder training takes place over the course of eight weeks, with the 
potential for extensions up to six months.
